document.full_text: a u.n. report alleging tens of thousands of civilians were killed and war crimes committed at the end sri lanka's war in 2009 drew widespread political reaction on tuesday, but left many ordinary sri lankans bemused at what purpose an investigation would serve.
document.title: why now, sri lankans ask after u.n. war crimes report
lines_and_colors: a u.n. report alleging tens of thousands of civilians were killed and war crimes committed at the end sri lanka's war in 2009 drew widespread political reaction on tuesday, but left many ordinary sri lankans bemused at what purpose an investigation would serve.
